00002 
00003       implicit none

00005       integer, parameter      :: wp = 8
00006       integer, parameter      :: vLen = 32, samps = 1
00007 
00008       real(wp), dimension(vLen,samps) :: uexact, tester
00009 
00010       integer                         :: i,j
00011       real(wp)                        :: norm_2
00012       character(3) :: istr
00013       character(8) :: filename
00014 
00015 
00016         do i=121,190
00017         write(istr,"(I3.1)") (i+1)
00018 
00019         open(unit=40,file='fort.'//istr)
00020         write(istr,"(I3.1)")i
00021         open(unit=50,file='fort.'//istr)
00022 
00023       norm_2 = 0.0_wp
00024       do j = 1,samps
00025          read(40,*) uexact(:,j)
00026          read(50,*) tester(:,j)
00027       
00028         norm_2 = norm_2 + dot_product(uexact(:,j)-tester(:,j),uexact(:,j)-tester(:,j))
00029       enddo
00030       write(*,*)'L2 norm of error =  ',sqrt(norm_2)
00031     
00032       close(unit=40)
00033       close(unit=50)
00034       
00035       enddo
